effects.name: Final Judgement
effects.description: Return all units that died this game to the battlefield under their owner's control with 1 health

body.raw:
# Judgement

The final trumpet sounds, calling all souls to rise and face their ultimate reckoning.

*"In the moment of judgement, all are made equal."*

Judgement represents reflection, reckoning, and inner calling. This ultimate spell can completely reverse the course of a game.
